ClickBoost.name: Mouse Boost
ClickBoost.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.

ClickBoost.name: Mouse Boost
ClickBoost.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

ClickBoost.name: Mouse Boost
ClickBoost.quote: A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool.

CookieBoost.name: Cookie Boost
CookieBoost.quote: No legacy is so rich as honesty.

CookieBoost.name: Cookie Boost
CookieBoost.quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.

CookieBoost.name: Cookie Boost
CookieBoost.quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.

CursorBoost.name: Cursor
CursorBoost.quote: If music be the food of love, play on.

CursorBoost.name: Cursor
CursorBoost.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.

CursorBoost.name: Cursor
CursorBoost.quote: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.

GrandMaBoost.name: GrandMa
GrandMaBoost.quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.

GrandMaBoost.name: GrandMa
GrandMaBoost.quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.

GrandMaBoost.name: GrandMa
GrandMaBoost.quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
